auditing.title: Activity tracking
auditing.description: Enables supervision, compliance, and audits the operations and risk to manage your IBM Cloud account.

keymanagement.title: Key management
keymanagement.description: Manage the lifecycle of your encryption keys that are used for you IBM Cloud resources, services, and applications.

logging.title: Logging
logging.description: Store, search, analyze, monitor, and alert on your IBM Cloud logging data and events.

monitoring.title: Monitoring
monitoring.description: Provides visibility of the performance and health of your IBM Cloud powered resources application.
